channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023090316
item.description:
Report X-2023090316

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023090316 SequenceEvent: Package contains one lead-acid battery packed in an open plastic bag inside of the box. Sulfuric acid inside of battery has leaked out and soaked through outer packaging. The package was taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered. DescribePack: Spillable battery, no apparent damage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered. 2. X-2023090319 SequenceEvent: Package contains one lead-acid battery packed into an open plastic bag inside of a box. Sulfuric acid from the battery has leaked out and soaked into the outer packaging. The package was taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered. DescribePack: spillable battery, no visible damage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered.

item.title: Report X-2023090308
item.description:
Report X-2023090308

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package discovered by PH with droplets around cap + chem odor. Package was removed from area, placed in a HazMat tote, and taken to HazMat cage using proper PPE, where it was discovered that cap failed to operate, resulting in small amount of liquid spilling out. DescribePack: Loose cap, small liquid leak DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was removed from area, placed in a HazMat tote, and taken to HazMat cage using proper PPE.

item.title: Report X-2023090290
item.description:
Report X-2023090290

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LEAKING HAZMAT BUCKET WAS FOUND DURING UNLOADING PROCESS, PUT IN A HAZMAT TOTE AND BROUGHT OVER FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED DescribePack: BUCKET WAS FOUND TO HAVE A DENT NEAR THE LID CAUSING THE LID TO POP ALLOWING THE PRODUCT TO SPILL OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PRODUCT WAS TURNED RIGHT SIDE UP.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the cap was loose on the one 405 gallon metal tote of chem trend (un3295) and that 3 ounces of product had been released. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023081857
item.description:
Report X-2023081857

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: BOX UNLOADED FROM TRUCK. SIDE CORNER OF BOX WAS WET DUE TO DROPPING IN THE SHIPPING PROCESS. PUT PACKAGE IMMEDIATELY IN HAZMAT TOTE WHILE USING GLOVES. PLACE IN HAZMAT CAGE UNTIL AFTER SORT WHEN I COULD PROCESS DescribePack: CAP LEAKED DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: IMMEDIATELY PLACED IN HAZMAT TOTE
